titles.title: To repeal the mandatory flood insurance coverage requirement for commercial properties located in flood hazard areas, and for other purposes.
To repeal the mandatory flood insurance coverage requirement for commercial properties located in flood hazard areas, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary: This bill limits the required purchase of flood insurance in certain circumstances to only residential properties (currently, the requirement applies to all types of property).
